last_episode_to_air.name: The Reaching Hand
last_episode_to_air.overview: A typhoon causes disasters in the city. Floods and fallen trees slow down Xu Qin and Song Yan from rescuing civilians. At this moment, Mrs. Meng is trapped in her car under a collapsing tunnel. Will rescuers get to her in time?

name: Fireworks of My Heart
overview: Fire chief Song Yan and emergency doctor Xu Qin were separated by family opposition when they were younger. Now ten years later, they meet again due to their professions. After experiencing life and death together, they manage to find their way back, working together and encouraging each other. They acknowledge each other's individual growth after years apart, but will they be able to overcome the obstacles in their path this time to stay together?

episodes.name: Long Time No See
episodes.overview: The Shili Tai Fire and Rescue Station is in a festive scene. Suddenly the alarm rang, and firefighters were dispatched immediately. In the early morning, ER doctor Xu Qin had just returned from the emergency room after a major operation. A few firefighters covered in mud rushed in, begging her to treat his comrade who has a toothache. When she told the man to remove his mask, the man turned away and left the emergency room.

episodes.name: Under The Same Roof
episodes.overview: Song Yan was called to the Captain's Office. The team received complaints. Thanks to the persuasion from the staff officer, Song Yan got out of the siege. In the locker room, several colleagues were talking about Xu Qin, and it was rumored that she was the next person to be promoted. It was said that Xu Qin's family had an unusual background, and her colleagues were stunned. Xu Qin encountered a traffic accident on the way off from work, Xu Qin stopped immediately and prepared to enter the scene.

episodes.name: Revival
episodes.overview: Song Yan came back from a mission and couldn't find the lighter, he ran to the garbage station to look for it. Song Yan told Suo Jun that the two had broken up due to family issues. Suo Jun comforted him. Xu Qin and Meng Yanchen came to the bar opened by Xiao Yixiao. After hearing that the fire department came to do a fire inspection, Xu Qin thought she could see Song Yan and ran out immediately. Seeing that Song Yan was not the one who came to check, Xu Qin felt depressed.

episodes.name: I Still Have You in My Heart
episodes.overview: Xu Qin learned that Song Yan was on vacation. So she came to his aunt's house again, hoping to reconcile with him. Song Yan refused. In the fire station, Song Yan complained to Suo Jun about the poor performance of the recruits. Song Yan firmly believed that he and Suo Jun could turn Shili Tai into the best fire station in the country. Suo Jun dodged his eyes.

episodes.name: Risk of Infection
episodes.overview: The driver who caused the accident surived, but the HIV-positive result of the blood test made everyone break out in a cold sweat. Not only were the doctors and nurses involved in the rescue at risk of infection, but the firefighters involved in the rescue that day were more likely to be infected. Xu Qin called the fire station, and all firefighters who participated in the rescue and were injured had to be checked. Xu Qin was worried and drew blood for Song Yan.

episodes.name: Home Accident
episodes.overview: Xu Qin was awakened by knocking on the door. It turned out a child's hand was stuck in the anti-theft fence of the balcony upstairs. Song Yan led the firefighters to launch a rescue from the balcony of Xu Qin's house. The child was saved. After the firefighters completed their task and extracted, Song Yan turned back, which surprised Xu Qin.

episodes.name: Stayed The Same
episodes.overview: Song Yan mistakenly thought it was his younger sister who came to bring him clothes and went out immediately. When the other firefighters heard that it was the female doctor Song Yan knows, they couldn't help but hide behind and peek. Xu Qin asked Song Yan to invite her to dinner, Song Yan reluctantly agreed. The two prepared for the date and came to a fried chicken shop they used to visit in high school. Time brings the two back to ten years ago.

episodes.name: My Closest Comrade
episodes.overview: Suo Jun told Song Yan about his difficulty, and Song Yan finally understood why Suo Jun wanted to be transferred. Suo Jun also advised Song Yan to get married soon. The two settled their suspicions. Looking at the honors of the fire station and listened to the thanks of the girl he saved, he tore up the transfer application he had written.

episodes.name: Warning
episodes.overview: Fu Wenying learns that Xu Qin doesn’t go on a date because of her busy work, and needs her to change her job. Xu Qin confesses that she has someone she likes. Fu Wenying warns Xu Qin not to force herself to be a villain again.

episodes.name: Back to The Square One
episodes.overview: Due to her mother's strict discipline, Xu Qin hasn’t dared to disobey her mother since she was a child. Although she is independent now, she is still stressed and afraid of facing her mother. She asks Song Yan to come out. Song Yan already knows she is in a dilemma before she speaks. Therefore, Song Yan agrees to go back to  square one.

episodes.name: Tamed Beast
episodes.overview: Xu Qin speaks her mind to Meng Yanchen. She thinks she has been like a tame beast since she was a kid so she didn't dare to resist her mother and also doesn’t know what love is. Meng Yanchen proposes to her to go abroad with him but she refuses.

episodes.name: Meaningless Sacrifice
episodes.overview: In order to speed up the replacement of old teammates and new blood, Jiang Yu proposes an idea to Song Yan but he disagrees with him. Song Yan thinks a fire scene is extremely dangerous and the new blood don’t have enough experience so they only are the reserves. Jiang Yu just wishes to avoid more meaningless sacrifices between the firefighters.

episodes.name: You're Not Her Brother
episodes.overview: Meng Yanchen finds Xu Qin in the hospital, and he meets Song Yan by chance. He warns Song Yan to keep his distance from Xu Qin. Song Yan understands what he means and tells him not to interfere with Xu Qin’s life since he is not her biological brother. Meng Yanchen advises her not to end the relationship with her family because of Song Yan.

episodes.name: A Blind Date
episodes.overview: Since Xu Qin is reluctant to go on the blind date arranged by her mother, she arranges for the parents of both parties to meet. Xu Qin tells Jiang Yu that she has a crush on a man. He promises to help her.

episodes.name: A Thankless Job
episodes.overview: A few college backpackers are stuck in a mountain and needed rescuing. Even the local civilian rescue team goes missing after looking for them. Without knowing the exact location, the firefighters face a tough rescue with the weather conditions and terrain. Meanwhile, Xu Qin receives a lesson on reading patients, not just treating them.

episodes.name: Setting Up a Joint Rescue Team
episodes.overview: Shilitai Fire and Rescue Station proposes a joint rescue effort with the city's First People's Hospital. Xu Qin volunteers to join the training. At the fire station, both firefighters and medical staff learn from one another to improve the efficiency and efficacy of rescue operations.

episodes.name: Duality
episodes.overview: After a bus flips over, a passenger named Chen Yu rescues many people before the firefighters arrive, but he is thrown out of the bus when it falls off a cliff and is seriously injured. He is called a hero by everyone, but he has an unknown side to him. Meanwhile, after the rescue, reporters want to interview Song Yan, but he introduces Xu Qin as the rescue team leader and gives the opportunity to her instead.

episodes.name: Dignity
episodes.overview: Jiang Yu and Li Meng went to a fire scene for a second inspection, but found some problems. The person in charge of the warehouse called a group of hooligans to beat them up but the firefighters can't fight or talk back, so they felt down in the dumps. Song Yan figured out a way to resolve their grievances, and they trained even harder.

episodes.name: Gifts
episodes.overview: Wu Xuan Yang calls 119 to rescue him and his alpaca, but Dr. Xu discovers that he has a serious condition called aortic dissection. His family doubts Dr. Xu's diagnosis but ends up being thankful to her for saving him. Meanwhile, Song Yan and Xu Qin exchange gifts with one another.

episodes.name: Mission
episodes.overview: Xu Qin's mom discovers about Xu Qin staying the fire station. She goes to Song Yan to tell him to stop seeing Xu Qin. However, Xu Qin tries to rekindle with Song Yan who shuts her down in return. Later, they get into an argument about the mission of public servants.

episodes.name: Drill
episodes.overview: With the medical staff gone from the fire station, Song Yan misses Xu Qin even though he refuses to admit it. However, a fire drill at the hospital reunites them again. Meanwhile, Dr. Xu contemplates her profession.

episodes.name: Rescue Team
episodes.overview: Teams are organized to help with the disaster rescue of earthquake victims in Wangxiang. The place is in bad shape, with many collapsed houses and structures and missing people. That includes Jiang Yi's mom, who's in Wangxiang with her sister, Jiang Yi's aunt.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Meng Yan Chen's mom wants her son and husband to let people know about the help they've been giving to disaster relief. Meanwhile, Song Yan and Xu Qin are both exhausted from the disaster rescue. Then, Song Yan gets seriously injured.

episodes.name: Duty
episodes.overview: Despite knowing Song Yan's life is in danger, Xu Qin chooses not to stay by his side and continues fulfilling her duty as a doctor. The firefighters continue doing their mission in earthquake relief. Later, Xu Qin and Jiang Yi receive news that put their mind at ease.

episodes.name: Falling into Place
episodes.overview: After the successful disaster relief operation, Song Yan and Xu Qin go back to their lives. However, they can't continue setting aside their feelings for each other anymore. Things are beginning to fall into place, even in Dr. Xu's work.

episodes.name: Overcoming Trauma
episodes.overview: Some firefighters struggle to get over their traumatic experience after providing the disaster relief at Wangxiang and are forced to overcome their anxiety by Yang Chi. Xu Qin is annoyed that Song Yan doesn't contact her for a day and doubts their relationship.

episodes.name: Caterpillars
episodes.overview: Meng Yan Chen finds out that Song Yan and Xu Qin are back together and tries to discourage Song Yan from being with her. He feels like he's been abandoned since Xu Qin went to find her happiness. Meanwhile, Xu Qin has learned to appreciate the process even if there might be no good outcome.

episodes.name: Staying Together
episodes.overview: Xu Qin confesses to her parents that she is dating Song Yan who highly disapprove of their relationship. As a result, she moves out from home into Song Yan's. His aunt and uncle welcome her happily.

episodes.name: Progress
episodes.overview: Xu Qin is welcomed warmly in the home of Song Yan's uncle and aunt. Xu Qin wants Meng Yan Chen to speak to their mom for her, but he refuses. Meanwhile, things seem to be progressing between Meng Yan Chen and Ye Zi.

episodes.name: Assurance
episodes.overview: Yan Chen tries to persuade his mom to let Xu Qin live her life, btu she doesn't back down. She invites Xu Qin to go shopping with her as a pretense to introduce her to another guy. Later, a mother and son threatens to jump off the hospital building Xu Qin works at.

episodes.name: Danger
episodes.overview: There's a cyanide leak at an electroplating plant. Firefighters are dispatched to save the three workers who have been poisoned and resolve the issue. However, Song Yan also gets poisoned during the process.

episodes.name: New Year
episodes.overview: Song Yan tells Xu Qin his future plans for them. Everyone is busy preparing and celebrating New Year, but the firefighters are still on duty to protect people. Xu Qin also goes home to visit her family for New Year.

episodes.name: Flashover
episodes.overview: Xu Qin is having a difficult time because her mom is interfering with her work at the hospital. Meanwhile, Song Yan is preparing for his transfer. However, a huge fire breaks out with a flashover that endangers the firefighters' lives.

episodes.name: Making Choices
episodes.overview: A life is lost in the fire at Junguang Square, which is owned by Guokun Group. Song Yan has to decide whether to report about the truth of the fire which caused a death of his comrade. However, that decision will sow more discord between him and Xu Qin's family.

episodes.name: New Developments
episodes.overview: Song Yan is being suspended from work due to accusations of bribery. A new development in Shilitai Fire and Rescue Station also makes Song Yan's decision to transfer waver. And Xu Qin starts asking for explanations of things that happened in the past.

episodes.name: Gunshot Truth
episodes.overview: A patient at the hospital gets worked up and injures Xu Qin's wrist. Meanwhile, despite being in an argument over his past, Song Yan still does not want to tell Xu Qin how he got his gunshot wound. Zhai Miao is worried for him and goes to see Xu Qin to help patch up their relationship.

episodes.name: Accusations
episodes.overview: Xu Qin finds out what her family did to Song Yan and confronts her parents. Meanwhile, Meng Yan Chen frankly tells Ye Zi his thoughts about her and makes her angry. So she comes up with a plan to take revenge on him.

episodes.name: An Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: Zhai Miao holds the evidence to prove Yan Chen's innocence. The choice is in her hands whether to give it up and help the Meng family that ruined Song Yan's life, or do the same and destroy the Meng family.

episodes.name: Typhoon
episodes.overview: Song Yan and Xu Qin are busy working with little time to prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, a super typhoon makes landfall in Yancheng and causes many people to be trapped or injured. Both the firefighters and medical staff have their hands full to help the people of Yancheng.

episodes.name: The Reaching Hand
episodes.overview: A typhoon causes disasters in the city. Floods and fallen trees slow down Xu Qin and Song Yan from rescuing civilians. At this moment, Mrs. Meng is trapped in her car under a collapsing tunnel. Will rescuers get to her in time?
